sub_title: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science
summary:
Embracing a proactive attitude and as a flexible, adaptable leaner as well as a good team player which is proved during the studying process and various projects at university, I am able to cope with pressure and setbacks. 
Thank you for a good grasp of business gained through studies and working experience, I am familiar with concepts in the field of Supply Chain and Logistics.  By doing many research and assignments using solving problems, critical thinking, and cooperation skills, I expect to get more opportunities to take advantage of them.

awards.title: Top 3 nominates for Blingathon
awards.description: Together with 4 students, I found the solution for a transport sector, and made an MVP of my team’s products. The track was about using blockchain within the transport sector and the use-case setting is in a busy port with ten thousands of containers, lots of stakeholders: owners, shippers, transport companies, truck drivers.

projects.title: Supply chain management and Strategy project
projects.description:
Formulating specific advice for the companies in terms of:
- Supply chain strategies (Lean & Agile, Push & Pull, Standardization, Customization, and Mass customization)
- Supply chain strategic choices (Outsourcing vs Offshoring, Integration, and collaboration)
- Supply chain elements (Plan, Source, Make, Store, Deliver and Return)
- Supply chain qualifications (TQM, industry standards)
- Risk and vulnerability

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: Project Export Plan to Germany for the Textmetrics
projects.description:
Together with three Dutch students to work on the export development for Textmetrics (A fast-developing company founded in 2014 which provides the augmented writing platform -located in Arnhem) to Germany. We have done some crucial milestones:
- Internal analysis, External analysis, Export, and culture. 
- Entering the market by using market entry strategies, indirect export.
- Giving some legal instructions and considering the capital structure. ( how much should the company borrow?/ what are the least expensive sources of funds for the firms? ) 
- Exporting marketing mix and delivering the service. 
- Checking foreign payments in Germany 
- Suggesting the financial planning as well as organizational consequences. 
- Helping with export documents and transaction documents such as quotation, invoice, mutual agreement, etc.
- Provide valid and reliable market research

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: Saxion Use-Case: Cross border digital accreditation 2022
projects.description:
Since 2020, EBSI is deploying a network of distributed blockchain nodes across Europe, supporting applications focused on selected use-cases. EBSI is the first EU-wide blockchain infrastructure, driven by the public sector, in full respect of European values and regulations. I and 4 other Blockchain members were working in:
	System description & architecture
	Functional Description of “the happy flow”
	Development PoC of the “happy flow” in the EBSI pre-prod environment
Contacts with: 
	RiVG
	DUO
	TNO
	Idemia
	University Rovira i Virgili

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: Sustainable business strategies for Texmetrics 2022
projects.description:
Together with other Dutch students to: 
- Identify how sustainable the company is based on Corporation Sustainability Model. 
- Data analysis and visualization of energy consumption of the company. 
- Implement sustainability with the organization system. 
- Present the life cycle assessment
- Develop the initiatives based on sustainable strategies. ( considering the stakeholders, corporate finance and related to mission, vision of the company) 
- Making recommendations for company to be sustainable in a long-term road.

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: Veal Fine Production CO2 Reduction Plan
projects.description:
Having working with 6 other students to make a specific plan to reduce the amount of C02 of Veal Fine company, I did some tasks to advise Veal Fine the effective ways of limiting their C02 emissions: 
- Analysing the internal aspects of Veal Fine and external factors around this company.
- Doing the SWOT analysis part and considering the purchase process/ cost structure and supply chain. 
- Researching the sustainable alternative trends as well as adapting the market trends 
- Making the actual implementation plan for Veal Fine.
- Calculating the CO2 emissions of the company related to livestock sectors, transportation, and processing. 
- Presenting to the company manager about our plan.
==> The recommendations really helped them to move forward and we got a lot of compliments on that.

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: Flocus Company Sales Plan 2021
projects.description:
During this project, I and other members had to come up with the sale plan for a specific period which included:
- Identifying the sales goals and targets (based on the internal and external analysis such as customers analysis, competitor analysis, etc.)
- Setting up sales strategies, sales techniques, sales approach, sales forecasting. 
- Operating sales and how to motivate the sales team, creating the order processing. 
- Evaluating the process and measuring the performance.
- Calculating growth rate and inventory turnover/ day’s sales in inventory. 
- Cash coverage ratio

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: Jotem water treatment export/ logistics plan- Risk management
projects.description:
Jotem is a fast-growing company which specializes in both national and international field. Their main products are Smartbox, Smartcube, Watermiracle and Watermiracle+, etc. My mission is to find the perfect country for exporting their products (between Poland and Bulgaria) by:
- Analysing the internal and external aspects of company and exported countries. 
- Considering the internal and external risk
- Measuring company’s financial budgets to export 
- Doing the customers analysis
- Proposing 4P’s and export entry strategy: trade barriers, agents, and export mode.
- Logistics and supply chain management. 
- Providing a professional plan to demonstrate our idea and convince them to export to Bulgaria. 
==> A complete export plan for Jotem to conduct for the next phase.

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: CAS supply chain & expenditure cycle analysis
projects.description:
The Personal project 
Analysis of the expenditure cycle and supply chain management of CAS. In details: 
- Analyzing the expenditure cycle activities: order materials and products, receive them and approve the supplies’s invoice, cash disbursements. 
- Making a visualization of steps above
- Making SIPOC models 
- Collecting the important documents of the company which are a purchase order, a certificate of origin, a contract, a packing slip, a commercial invoice. 
- Writing a report based on ERP system.

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

projects.title: World Trade Center Twente online community project
projects.description:
With a group of 4 Dutch students, I have conducted thorough research to launch the best online community for WTC Twente. By implementing in crucial 4 milestones which are:
- Types of communities, platforms.
- Trends and development of an online community.
- Benchmarking
- Customer analysis and their impacts.
Finally, visuals, the choice of community, and the platform for WTC are chosen.

contributors.headline: Bachelor of Applied Science | Excellent Track Student at Saxion University of Applied Science

courses.name: Power BI Data Modeling with DAX

profile_positions.description:
- During my academic and professional journey, I have had the privilege of engaging in a multitude of impactful environmental initiatives. Among these endeavors, I meticulously calculated the Carbon Footprint and conducted a comprehensive Life Cycle Assessment for the organization I was associated with. 
- To facilitate data transparency and decision-making, I played an integral role in the development of a sophisticated dashboard. This instrument was designed to seamlessly import and present data, offering a comprehensive overview of the company's carbon footprint for the year 2019.
- Additionally, I undertook the responsibility of creating and presenting weekly task force reports to senior management. 
- Moreover, in my capacity as a conscientious advocate for sustainability, I frequently engaged with clients, offering guidance and insight into necessary actions to reduce their environmental impact. I escalated critical sustainability issues to clients and collaborated closely with them to develop and implement environmentally responsible solutions.

company.name: The project “ Hội An Old Quarter” introduction to international tourists

volunteer_experiences.description:
- Introducing to tourists about Hội An Ancient declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO (1999) as a well-preserved example of a Southeast Asian trading port of the 15th to 19th centuries. 
- Giving the guide to 5 old museums in Hội An including Hội An museum of history and culture, Sa Huynh culture museum Hội An, Hội An museum of history and culture, etc. 
- Cooperating with Culture department to show the beauty of Hội An during 8 months period.
